entry.title: $2495 // $2495 / 1br-Quiet, Sunny 1 bedroom in the heart of the Lower East Side
entry.content:
- NO BROKERS PLEASE -

We are looking for someone to take over our beloved Lower East Side apartment. You will start a new lease with the management company when you move in, so be prepared with bank statements, paystubs, current tax return, and proof of employment. I actually replaced someone else when I moved in and the transition process is easy and seamless.

We have lived in this apartment for 2.5 years and love it. It's a bargain for the area & the state of the apartment.

THE APARTMENT:
- True one bedroom in the heart of the Lower East Side
- Large bedroom that fits a queen sized bed
- Modern furnishes, building recently renovated
- Approximately 450 square feet
- LOTS of closet space
- Fourth floor walk up
- Cat-friendly
- Full size bathroom (huge bathtub!)
- One block from the F train and M-15 SBS
- In the middle of all the action! Steps from Katz's, Sweet Chick, The Meatball Shop, Pianos, Kind Regards, 4 ramen shops, you name it
- Run by a management company who is really on top of it - if you call with a maintenance request, they come the same day

We are looking for someone to move in on September 15th, but we are flexible with move-in date. I will be showing the apartment. Please email me with a suggested date and time that you would like to see the space!

Note: If you found this apartment on your own, you'd expect to pay a hefty brokers fee. There is a "lease transfer fee" but it's a small fraction of what the brokers fee would be.
